label.antiShipDpmPerCommandPoint: Anti ship DPM per command point
label.antiAirDpmPerCommandPoint: Anti air DPM per command point

techFiles.pageDescription1: This pages shows detailed probabilities for tech file content.
techFiles.pageDescription2: We know from research agreement, that ships have weighted probability within their ship type. This page assumes that those weight values are also used for tech files.
techFiles.pageDescription3: Probabilities change based on what you have already acquired. Acquired blueprints can be configured on the "My List" page
techFiles.pageFootnote: * Tap or click boxes to expand details
techFiles.multipleShipVariantsAvailable: Multiple ship variants are still available
techFiles.sumOfProbabilityWeightWithinShipType: Sum of weights within ship type
techFiles.sumOfProbabilityWeightWithinAvailableShi: Sum of weight for unacquired ship variants
techFiles.baseShipVariantShipTypeProbability: Ship type probability of base variant

researchAgreement.pageDescription1: This page shows detailed probabilities for every filter in research agreement
researchAgreement.pageDescription2: Data can be narrowed by company, strategy type and tactic type. Selecting a ship will list up all filters containg that ship sorted by probability.
researchAgreement.pageDescription3: Blueprints that you have already acquired can be configured on the "My list" page.

fleetSetup.pageFootnote: * All data is stored in local storage of your browser.
fleetSetup.fleetEmptyNotice: No ships have been added to this fleet. In order to add ships, click the "Edit" button above and switch to edit mode.
fleetSetup.groupByRowSortByShipTypeAndName: Group by row, sort by type, then name
fleetSetup.groupByShipTypeSortByName: Group by type, sort by name
fleetSetup.addShipsDescription: Adding ships by consuming command points. Acquired ships can be configured on the "My list" page.
fleetSetup.addAircraftDescription: Selected aircraft will be assignment to hangar. Acquired aircrafts can be configured on the "My list" page.
fleetSetup.addReinforcementDescriptionSelf: Addiong reinfocement from own base. Acquired ships can be configured on the "My list" page.
fleetSetup.addReinforcementDescriptionAllyA: Adding org. reinforcement from union member A
fleetSetup.addReinforcementDescriptionAllyB: Adding org. reinforcement from union member B
fleetSetup.addReinforcementDescriptionAllyC: Adding org. reinforcement from union member C
fleetSetup.confirmInitializeFleet: Initializing will clear the current fleet and restore default settings.
fleetSetup.configureModulesFootnote: * Acquired modules can be configured on the "My list" page. All modules are available without limitation when setting "Available ships" to "All ships" or when adding ships using org. reinforcement.

myList.pageDescription1: This page allows you to configure blueprints and modules that you have already acquired.
myList.pageDescription2: Once configured, other pages can show data adapted to your personal inventory, e.g. probabilities for ship variants become available.
myList.pageDescription3: You can also specify which ships and modules you want or not want to acquire. This allows other pages to show aggregated probabilities for your personalized preference.
myList.pageFootnote: * All data is stored in local storage of your browser.
myList.unwantedDuplicatesFootnote: * Automatically filled list of blueprints that either turn into tech points or unwanted ship variant
myList.confirmInitialize: Initializing will clear your data and reset every list to its initial state.

myListConfig.pageDescription1: This page allows you to configure blueprints and modules that you have already acquired.
myListConfig.pageDescription2: There is no need to configure everything at once. You can save and continue anytime.
myListConfig.pageDescription3: All data is stored in local storage of your browser.

imageEdit.pageDescription1: This page can vertically merge multiple images into one file.
imageEdit.pageDescription2: For example, you can use this to crop and merge screenshots from in-game battle reports.
imageEdit.cutAndMoveDescription: Use sliders on the left side to crop images. Use sliders on the right side to move images on top of each other.
imageEdit.imageReady: The image can be saved now. You can also right click the image or long press to open context menu for saving or copying to clipboard.

shipSource.dockEffect: Temporary blueprints acquired by docking effect
shipSource.starterShip: Blueprints acquired by starter tech files

enhancementSubType.increaseDamageOfAircraft: Increase damage of aircraft/UAV in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseDamageOfAircraftMainWeapon: Increase main weapon's damage of aircraft in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseDamageOfCorvette: Increase damage of corvettes in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseDamageOfUav: Increase damage of UAV in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseCriticalDamageAndChance: Increase critical hit damage and chance
enhancementSubType.increaseHitRateOfAircraft: Increase hit rate of aircraft/UAV in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseHitRateOfAircraftMainWeapon: Increase main weapon's hit rate of aircraft in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseHitRateOfCorvette: Increase hit rate of corvettes in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseHitRateOfUav: Increase hit rate of UAV in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseHitRateVsLarge: Increase hit rate against cruiser and higher-class ships
enhancementSubType.increaseProjectileHitRateMidRow: Increase projectile hitrate for mid-row ships
enhancementSubType.increaseTorpedoHitRateMidRow: Increase torpedo hitrate for mid-row ships
enhancementSubType.increaseMissileHitRateMidRow: Increase missile hitrate for mid-row ships
enhancementSubType.increaseInterceptionChance: Increase chance to intercept missles and torpedoes
enhancementSubType.increaseMissileEvasionOfAircraft: Increase missle evasion of aircraft/UAV in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseMissileEvasionOfCorvette: Increase missle evasion of corvettes in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseMissileEvasionOfUav: Increase missle evasion of UAV in hangar
enhancementSubType.increaseProductionSpeed: Increase production speed of auxiliary ship
enhancementSubType.reduceLockOnOfAircraft: Reduce lock-on time of aircraft in hangar
enhancementSubType.reduceLockOnOfUav: Reduce lock-on time of UAV in hangar
enhancementSubType.reduceRtbAircraft: Reduce RTB cooldown of aircraft/UAV in the hangar
enhancementSubType.reduceRtbCorvette: Reduce RTB cooldown of corvettes in the hangar
enhancementSubType.reduceRtbUav: Reduce RTB cooldown of UAV in the hangar
enhancementSubType.reducePrefabCost: Reduce prefab cost for quick repair
enhancementSubType.reduceUeCoinCost: Reduce uEcoins cost for auxiliary shipbuilding
enhancementSubType.reduceCritialDamageReceived: Reduce critical damage received by the system
enhancementSubType.reduceProjectileDamageReceived: Reduce damage received from projectile weapons
enhancementSubType.reduceHitByProjectileInBackRow: Reduce chance of back-row ships being hit by projectile weapons
enhancementSubType.reduceHitByProjectileInMidRow: Reduce chance of mid-row ships being hit by projectile weapons
enhancementSubType.reduceHitByTorpedoInBackRow: Reduce chance of back-row ships being hit by torpedoes
enhancementSubType.reduceHitByMissileInBackRow: Reduce chance of back-row ships being hit by missiles
enhancementSubType.reduceHitBySlowInBackRow: Reduce chance of back-row ships being hit by slow weapons
enhancementSubType.reduceHitByMissleAndTorpedo: Reduce chance of being hit by missiles/torpedoes

enhancementDescription.specialAmmo: Supplies all weapons of the ship with special ammo for 15 rounds, increasing the damage of weapons with special ammo
enhancementDescription.collateralDamage: Primary weapon system when destroyed, the module of this system will also be damaged and invalidated, resulting in an explosion that wipes out HP.
enhancementDescription.focusFire: When selecting targets, boost attack efficiency by prioritizing attacks on a certain percentage of selected targets based on the number of all valid targets in the engagement.
enhancementDescription.fleetDock1: Enable fleet docking authority to allow the fleet to expand and dock to other fleets.
enhancementDescription.fleetDock2: Increase the speed at which the ship repairs ships from our company by 30%. $t(enhancementDescription.fleetDock1)
enhancementDescription.sailingSpeedCoordination1: Qualified fleets will maintain a sailing speed and warp speed at 80+20% of all ship's avarage speed.
enhancementDescription.overdrive: Turns off all other weapon systems, increase damage frequency by 4, increases the continuous firing duration of the main ion cannon by 100%, and increases hit rate by 35% every {{interval}}s for {{duration}}s. Cooldown: {{cooldown}}s.
enhancementDescription.antiAircraftSupport: The primary weapon locks onto enemy aircraft in the nearby row and launches attacks, increasing the hit rate by 40% every 30s for 25s.
enhancementDescription.rapidFire: Reduces the primary weapon's firing duration and cooldown by {{value}}% every {{interval}}s for {{duration}}s. Cooldown: {{cooldown}}s.
enhancementDescription.concentratedStrike: After the battle begins, the carried aircraft lock onto the same target in the first 4 rounds of attacks and increases the evasion of the carried aircraft by 10%
enhancementDescription.concentrateFirePeriodically: Syncs all weapons in the system to focus fire on one single target and reduces cooldown by {{reduceCooldown}}% every {{interval}}s for {{duration}}s.
enhancementDescription.evasiveManeuvers: When the ship's HP falls to {{hp}}%, increases evasion by {{evasion}}% for {{duration}}s. This effect only triggers once per battle.
enhancementDescription.moraleBooster: Whenever the enemy loses a cruiser, it decreases the weapon system cooldown by 85% for 10s.
enhancementDescription.siegeTactic2: If your fleet's command point value is greater than that of the opponent's before entering a combat engagement, then the enemy fleet cannot retreat within the first {{duration}}s of the engagement.
enhancementDescription.patrollingDefense: When a fleet guards a resource node, it can also guard other resource nodes within the operation area. Guards up to {{nodeCount}} additional resource node(s).
enhancementDescription.combatSurge: When the fleets engage in combat, they tackle the enemy by approaching them, increasing the time required for both parties's fleet to retreat by {{duration}}s.
enhancementDescription.shipChargingStance: Changes ship position to the front row of your formation
enhancementDescription.desperateMeasures2: While in combat, when the enemy's fleet command point is {{percentage}}% higher than you, priotizes attack on {{targetCount}} target(s) with the lowest HP.
enhancementDescription.waveAdjustment: Prioritizes launching aircraft squadrons that have extended attack duration in a strategic strike.
enhancementDescription.strategicStrike1: Command the fleet to launch a strategic strike on targets within a designated {{angle}}° area.
enhancementDescription.strategicStrike3: Launches a strategic strike on targets within a designated {{angle}}° area within a maximum distance of {{distance}}Gm
enhancementDescription.auxiliaryAttackRadar: Increases the main weapons hitrate of aircraft carrying out a strategic strike by {{hitrate}}
enhancementDescription.aircraftEmergencyRepair: Repairs {{damage}}% damage on aircraft returning from a strategic strike.

enhancementCondition.sailingSpeedCoordination1: The fleet consists of only frigates and auxiliary ships.
